Whipper motor for Cecilware cappuccino machines. Part# CD-75A (CD75A) for GB-3, GB3-LD cappuccino machine. Solve your squealing/broken motor problems yourself. Only 3 wires and two to deal with and you'll have a new motor installed. The part shown may be the same OR the equivalent of the factory part. Sold each motor. Less ARCO Coffee Co. Great for kitchens where space is at a premium, this 75,000... More
Easily prepare delicious chicken, burgers, grilled vegetables, and more with the Cecilware CCB1836 36" gas lava rock charbroiler! Great for kitchens where space is at a premium, this 75,000 BTU unit lets you easily delight customers with delicious foods thanks to the 36" x 15 1/2" cast iron cooking grate and reusable lava rock briquettes that create authentic charbroiled taste and appearance. Each of the unit's six burners are independently controlled for maximum convenience, and boast higher levels of power to give you optimum production capabilities while maintaining a small footprint! This unit features heavy-gauge steel unibody construction, a stainless steel front, 2 1/2" adjustable legs, and a removable, non-corrosive aluminum drip pan for convenience and durability. The Cecilware CCB1836 has a 3/4" NPT gas manifold pipe and is NSF Listed. Please consult the Specification Sheet for additional details. Choose fuel type. Great for kitchens where space is at a premium, this 75,000 BTU unit lets you easily delight customers with delicious foods thanks to the 36" x 15 1/2" cast iron cooking grate and reusable lava rock briquettes that create authentic charbroiled taste and appearance. Each of the unit's six burners are independently controlled for maximum convenience, and boast higher levels of power to give you optimum production capabilities while maintaining a small footprint! This unit features heavy-gauge steel unibody construction, a stainless steel front, 2 1/2" adjustable legs, and a removable, non-corrosive aluminum drip pan for convenience and durability. Cecilware FE-100 Automatic Dual Coffee Urn Brewer - two 3 gallon urns. New Cecilware urns sell for about $3000.00 so you... More
This is not the best photograph, the urn is in really good shape. Cecilware FE-100 Automatic Dual Coffee Urn Brewer - two 3 gallon urns. New Cecilware urns sell for about $3000.00 so you can save yourself alot of money by buying a pre-owned twin urn. This is ideal for hotels, or anyplace that holds large events. Hooks up to a waterline. Cecilware is well known in the industry for their fine quality coffee urns. Quality designed, engineered, and constructed stainless steel. Ideal for large events. Brews consistently perfect coffee batch after batch.Two 3 gallon urns( Uses 3 gallon paper filters). Mistake proof, push button - coffee/water formula is automatically locked into brewing cycle. This is a PRE- OWNED machine. It has been cleaned, serviced, and inspected by qualified technicians and is in excellent working condition. Electical: 120/240V AC, 60Hz, single phase, 3 wire Water Connection: 1/4" tubing Dimensions: 18"D X 25"H X 33 1/2"W Comes with a 30 day warranty. Local pick up or call 800-283-2726 for freight quote. Quench their thirst and boost impulse sales at your snack bar, buffet, or fast food restaurant with this Cecilware Arctic Economy 20/3PE four bowl 5.4 gallon... More
Your customers are parched! Quench their thirst and boost impulse sales at your snack bar, buffet, or fast food restaurant with this Cecilware Arctic Economy 20/3PE four bowl 5.4 gallon premix cold beverage dispenser. At only 28 1/2" wide, this 4 bowl premix cold beverage dispenser features four 5.4 gallon refrigerated bowls for long-lasting refreshment while sacrificing minimal countertop space! With the ability to set the dispenser for fast or gentle agitation to accommodate fruit juice and dairy products, it is perfect for serving fruit juice, iced tea, iced coffee, and other refreshingly chilled drinks. The Cecilware Arctic Economy 20/4PE beverage dispenser's 1/7 hp compressor that uses R134A refrigerant will keep your beverages chilled and ready for consumption for hours at a time. It requires a 120V electrical connection and is UL and NSF Listed. Dimensions Height: 26 1/2" Width: 28 1/2" Depth: 18 1/2" Also known as 20-4PE, 20 4PE, and 204PE. 20/4PE From Grindmaster Cecilware Less The WEBstaurant Store 267 store reviews See Store Info /cecilware-arctic-economy/cpygE7XFR-E5F9y-Z4lD8Q==/info The WEBstaurant Store $2,650.00 $1,389.00 48% Off No Shipping Info Visit Store http://di103.shoppingshadow.com/images/di/37/34/33/5a4241576d596b5a7076456a6838716e554151-100x100-0-0.jpg?p=yVnUd3XP9V&a;=1&c;=1&l;=3033102&t;=07%2F12%2F12%2003%3A52%3A47%20PM&r;=18&d;=1645.25&rt;=mr Grindmaster- Cecilware GB3M210W-LD-U 3 flavor cappuccino machine Grindmaster- Cecilware GB3M210W-LD-U 3 flavor cappuccino machine ( In stock ) Standard Features: Fast Flow Dispenses beverages 30% faster, reducing wear&tear on major dispenser components. Quick Change Transparency Simply lift up 2 tabs and pull out the graphic. Your customers are parched! Quench their thirst and boost impulse sales at your snack bar, buffet, or fast food restaurant with this Cecilware Arctic Deluxe 20/4PD four bowl 5.4 gallon premix cold beverage dispenser. Because each bowl has its own motor, the four bowls operate independently of one another so that you have greater control over your beverages. At only 28 1/2" wide, this 4 bowl premix cold beverage dispenser features four 5.4 gallon refrigerated bowls for long-lasting refreshment while sacrificing minimal countertop space! With the ability to set the dispenser for fast or gentle agitation for juice or dairy beverages, it is perfect for serving three types of fruit juice, iced tea, iced coffee, and other refreshingly chilled drinks. The Cecilware Arctic Deluxe 20/4PD beverage dispenser's 1/7 hp compressor that uses R134A refrigerant will keep your beverages chilled and ready for consumption for hours at a time. It requires a 120V electrical connection and is UL and NSF Listed.
